original_text: My Christian friends, do you think that I still teach that someone must circumcise believers? If I really taught that, then I would not still receive trouble from people. What I teach about Christ's death on the cross would not cause anyone to become angry.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 지금까지 할례를 전한다면 어찌하여 지금까지 박해를 받으리요 그리하였으면 십자가의 걸림돌이 제거되었으리니

sentences.original_text: do you think that I still teach
then I would not still receive trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 나는 여전히 고통을 받지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: What I teach about Christ's death
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그리스도의 죽음에 대해 가르치는 것

sentences.original_text: on the cross would not cause anyone
sentences.korean_translation: 십자가 위에서는 누구도 야기하지 않을 것입니다
